description: Addresses lack of accessible environmental data about local neighborhoods by providing real-time insights on traffic noise, air quality, and green areas. Uses AI to predict environmental changes 5-50 years into the future, helping communities plan for sustainable urban development. Empowers citizens with a 'Trivsel Score' (well-being score) to make informed decisions about where to live. Targets UN SDG 11 (Sustainable Cities and Communities), SDG 13 (Climate Action), and SDG 3 (Good Health and Well-being).
